name: Fondazione Adkins Chiti: Donne in Musica
goal: With a network of associations for women composers, songwriters and creators of music in 113 countries we work to promote, mainstream and empower the music of women in all genres and all parts of the world. We maintain a growing library of scores of music by women, run festivals and concert series with women's music, advocate on their behalf at national, European and International level. We research and publish books, reports, studies and also collaborate with training institutions, schools and with universities. Active since 1978 we maintain data banks for over 27 thousand women composers and run an online Encyclopedia of living women composers.  We have undertaken several EU funded projects, the last of which WIMUST (Women in Music Uniting Strategies for Talent) was completed in December 2013.  We give scholarships to resident scholars and composers and commission up to 40 new works each year. We have also contributed to a number of White Paper Publications
euInitiatives:
music of all kinds from classical to contemporary and from traditional to commercial forms
women and their entitlement within the field of music
culture empowerment and mainstreaming for composers and creators of music
Equal opportunities for women in music
